app.name: Magento
app.short_description: Displays customer and order details from Magento.
app.long_description:
The Zendesk Support for Magento app works to unite your business with a dynamic two-way integration between Zendesk Support ticket data and Magento e-commerce data.

### Improve customer satisfaction with better conversations

* Manage all your customer interactions in one place, whether you have one Magento site or several driving efficiencies within your Support team.
* Get more visibility on relevant customer data from Magento, such as billing, shipping, and order info on Zendesk Support ticket pages and user profiles.
* Add Zendesk Support communication channels to any Magento-powered site so your customers can get in touch with your Support team wherever they are.

### Sync your teams for faster resolutions and higher revenues

* Easily collaborate to resolve customer issues faster with access to support ticket information in a custom Zendesk Support panel within Magento.
* Stay up-to-date on the account and the customer with a single view of support information next to critical sales statistics, customer profiles, and sales orders.
* Create and update Zendesk Support tickets directly in Magento for greater Support team efficiencies.

For complete setup instructions, see the [setup guide](https://support.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/articles/203660046).

By enabling this app, You agree to the [Built by Zendesk Terms of Use](https://www.zendesk.com/company/built-by-zendesk-agmt/).
app.installation_instructions:
### Availability and Supported Versions

Zendesk Support for Magento is available at no cost to all Zendesk Support customers. Furthermore, this integration is supported on Magento Community 1.7+ and Enterprise 1.9+.

### Prerequisites

* Magento Community v1.7+ or Magento Enterprise v1.9+ with full administrator rights
* PHP 5.2

### How to install

The *Zendesk Support for Magento* setup has two parts.  First, sign in to your Zendesk Support account, then follow the [instructions here](https://support.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/articles/203660046) to download the extension and learn how to configure the extension in Magento.  When this is complete, you are ready to add the *Magento App for Zendesk Support* to your account.

In Zendesk Support, click the Admin icon in the sidebar. Select Apps > Marketplace, then find the Magento app and click the tile. On the Magento app page, click Install app in the upper-right corner. Configure the app settings, then click Install:

* **Title**: Name for the application.
* **Store URL**: The URL to your Magneto store (for example, http://www.zendesk-store.com).
* **Store Code**: Add the default store code you use, if you have 'Add Store Code to Urls' set to 'Yes' on your Magento store.
* **Access token**: Your API access token from the Zendesk Support extension for Magento.
* **Order ID Field ID**: The Zendesk Support custom field ID you are using to store the associated Magento order number.

For complete instructions, see the [setup guide](https://support.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/articles/203660066).
